metadata.title: CVE-2014-3755 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The QSvg module in Qt, as used in the Mumble client 1.2.x before 1.2.6,allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (hang and resourceconsumption) via a local file reference in an (1) image tag or (2) XMLstylesheet in an SVG file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3755` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mumble - 1.2.6-1
mumble-server - 1.2.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mumble package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.6-1').
